TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AsyncCompletedEventHandler(object sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AsyncCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AsyncCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AsyncCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void AsyncCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type AsyncCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AsyncCompletedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理异步操作的 MethodName 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the *MethodName* event of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 只要事件发生, 就会调用事件处理程序方法, 除非删除委托。The event-handler method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 对于在你的组件中名为*方法*的异步方法, 你将具有相应的*方法名称*`Completed`事件和一个可选的*方法名称*`CompletedEventArgs`类。For an asynchronous method, called *MethodName*, in your component, you will have a corresponding *MethodName*`Completed` event, and an optional *MethodName*`CompletedEventArgs` class. 对于支持异步方法的多个并发调用的组件, 客户端可以提供一个唯一的标记或任务 ID 来区分引发特定事件的异步任务。For a component that supports multiple concurrent invocations of its asynchronous methods, the client can supply a unique token, or task ID, to distinguish which asynchronous task is raising particular events. 客户端可以读取属性以确定报告完成的任务。The client's can read the property to determine which task is reporting completion. 你的实现应使用来创建一个 , 它将客户端的任务 id 与挂起的异步任务相关联。Your implementation should use the to create an that associates the client's task IDs with pending asynchronous tasks. ## Examples 有关委托的代码示例, 请参阅类中的示例。For a code example of the delegate, see the example in the class.
